context.note: Avoid injury! Use cruise control only in large, open areas. Shut off before turning or when in areas with many obstacles.
The cruise control is only operational when the machine is traveling forward.

substep.cmd: Depress forward travel pedal until desired travel speed is reached.
Lift cruise control lever (A) to engage.

step.info: The cruise control can be disengaged in one of two ways:

choices.choice: Depress brake pedal and push cruise control lever down.
Increase travel speed slightly and push cruise control lever down.
Increase travel speed by pressing forward travel pedal until desired speed is reached.
Decrease travel speed by disengaging cruise control, adjusting forward travel speed as desired, and engage cruise control lever.
